description: This file defines React functional components for transition effects in a video or animation context using Remotion library. It includes components for cross-fading, sliding in, and sliding out elements with customizable durations and directions.

methods.name: CrossFade
methods.description: A React component for cross-fading content based on frame interpolation.

methods.name: SlideIn
methods.description: A React component that implements a slide-in transition from specified directions.

methods.name: SlideOut
methods.description: A React component that implements a slide-out transition to specified directions.
